E0004_ID_MISMATCH_WITH_OBJECT_ID: E0004:list of ids mismatch with object ids
E0005_URL_ID_MISMATCH_WITH_OBJECT_ID: E0005:ids in URL mismatch with object ids
E0006_NO_ID_IN_URL: E0006:url does not mention any ids
E0007_INVALID_IDS: E0007:not all ids exist in database

E0010_PERMISSION_INSERT: E0010:you are not allowed to insert one or more objects
